ygData.subject: Re: spells
ygData.msgSnippet: The problems I have with enstill is that it is resisted at a really high rate. Whites, yellows, reds almost always resits while blues resist a majority of the
ygData.messageBody:
The problems I have with enstill is that it is resisted at a really high
rate. Whites, yellows, reds almost always resits while blues resist a
majority of the time. Greens resist their fare share too :P

Croesus Illuminatus (Xegony)

Lim Dul wrote:
>
> From: Lim Dul <sevendegrees@...>
>
> That's very interesting. I am new to my 20th level spells so I've just been
> experimenting with them every now and again. You say enstill sucks? I've
> been very successful with it so far...although I haven't used it that much
> yet, I LOVE the period of time it takes for a creature to get out of it. :)
> Not too many fizzles yet...no more than root I'd say. Was I just lucky?
> Granted, Root is still more mana efficient for me right now at 20.
>
> I haven't used the stun spell "Tishan's Clash" (?) yet. More people hate it
> than like it so far when I ask around. I know it stuns casters... how long
> does this stun period last? Does this stun spell cast at a faster rate than
> any of the shock spells? I'm just wondering if we'd be better off just
> nuking the MoB as fast as we can rather than waste time stunning it? PLEASE
> prove me wrong. ;) (I'd love to use new spells)
>
> -- Lim'Dul
> 20 Wiz Veeshan
>
> >I very rarely use a root in a group anymore (and enstill really is
> >terrible)
> >since when I group I usually have 3 tanks in the group that do some good
> >damge when they are circled around a Target..I wait till I see the targets
> >health go down a bit then cast...watch the health bar go down someomore
> >from
> >my cast and the damage the Fighters are doing then cast one last time for a
> >take down.
>
